name: Date MMddyy v1.1 (leap year still excluded)
description: This is more like a Brute force method. Since I didn't find a good one for myself, thought I'll create one.IMP NOTE: Doesn't check for leap years. All months in feb have 28days !!PS: I'm new to RegExFixes:v1.1: Feb dates like 021909 were not matching earlier
author: Aviral Sharma
